titlestmt.titleproper: preliminary Guide to the Center for Career Education and Workshops records, 1962-1990 RG0121

repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

did.unittitle: Center for Career Education and Workshops records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: George Washington University. Center for Career Education

did.abstract: The materials in this collection consist of Continuing Education for Women Program publications and correspondence; Publication samples, advertisements, and press clippings; Continuing Education for Women Program brochures, articles, history, course schedules, and programs; Legal Assistant Program special events and office files; and American Bar Association annual reports and correspondence related to the Legal Assistant Program.

prefercite.head: Preferred citation
prefercite.p: Center for Career Education and Workshops records, Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Series 4 and 5 are closed to research for 25 years from date of record creation.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

bioghist.head: Historical or Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Center for Career Education provides a series of professional certificate programs which help students develop skills and build credentials to meet the demands of an increasingly complex and competitive work environment. A variety of computer and technology classes are offered to those interested in continuing their career education. Much of this collection relates to the Continuing Education for Women program.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Tha materials in this collection consist of Continuing Education for Women Program publications and correspondence; Publication samples, advertisements, and press clippings; Continuing Education for Women Program brochures, articles, history, course schedules, and programs; Legal Assistant Program special events and office files; and American Bar Association annual reports and correspondence related to the Legal Assistant Program.

arrangement.head: Collection Organization
arrangement.p: Organized into five series: Continuing Education for Women Program publications and correspondence; Publication samples, advertisements, and press clippings; Continuing Education for Women Program brochures, articles, history, course schedules, and programs; Legal Assistant Program special events and office files; and American Bar Association annual reports and correspondence related to the Legal Assistant Program.

did.unittitle: Continuing Education for Women Program publications and correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series contains publications, brochures, new horizon newsletter, correspondence reated to Continuing Education for Women Program. The materials range in date from 1962-73.
This series has a paper container list in the reading room, please ask staff for assistance.

did.unittitle: Publication samples, advertisements, and press clippings

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series consists of publication samples, advertisements, press clippings. The materials range in date from 1963-84.
This series has a paper container list in the reading room, please ask staff for assistance.

did.unittitle: Continuing Education for Women Program brochures, articles, history, course schedules, and programs

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series contains brochures, articles, paper by Ruth Osborn on history of program, course schedules, career oriented programs related to the Continuing Education for Women Program. The materials range in date from 1965-90.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: By Ruth H. Osborn, Director of the Program (2 copies)

Legal Assistant Program special events and office files

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series consists of special events and office files related to the Legal Asistant Program. The materials range in date from 1973-88.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Topics covered: labor law (25-27); complex litigation; Washington rep.; computers; legal writing; tax; government contracts; bankruptcy; environmental, folders #25-51

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Contains class lists, flyers, book lists, form letters, tuition information, workshops, etc., folders #65-72

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Includes books used and instructors, folders #33-38

did.unittitle: Legal Economics article by Carol Dietrich
LAP No. VA Class Legal Research and Writing
ABA Workshop: Working with Legal Assistants
Department of Justice, Bureau of Prison Proposal

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series consists of American Bar Association annual reports and correspondence related to the Legal Assistant Program. The materials range in date from 1972-88.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: With 1988 updates, attachments to 1986 reapproval application, attachments to annual report (Sept. 1988)
